function.name: ventMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the ventilation mode of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the ventilation mode.

predefinedVentMode.description: The predefined mode to set for the ventilation (e.g., automatic, bypass, heat transfer, sleep).
